subject: Urgent: Suspicious Activity Detected
body: We detected a login from a new device in Brazil (IP: 192.168.x.x). If this wasn't you, click here to freeze your account immediately.

subject: Tech Weekly: AI is taking over?
body: This week's top stories: Llama 3 released, NVIDIA stocks soar, and Python 3.13 introduces JIT compilation. Read the full analysis attached.

subject: Q3 Report Deadline
body: Hi, I need the Q3 sales report by Friday 5 PM. Please explicitly list the risk factors and revenue projections.

subject: Holiday Policy Update
body: Please review the attached document regarding the new carry-over policy for annual leave. You must submit your leave requests by Dec 15th.

subject: I have a job for you
body: Are you interested in a new role? Earn $5000/day working from home! No experience needed. Click here to apply now.

subject: Meeting Request: Phase 2 Kickoff
body: Can we meet next Tuesday at 2 PM to discuss the Phase 2 roadmap? I want to go over the budget and timeline. Let me know if that works.

subject: Dinner this Sunday?
body: Are you coming over for dinner? Dad is making lasagna. Let me know by tomorrow so I can buy groceries.

subject: Server Downtime Scheduled
body: Maintenance is scheduled for Saturday 2 AM to 4 AM UTC. Please save all work and disconnect from the VPN.

subject: Your package has arrived
body: Your package was left at the front door. Track number: #998877. Rate your delivery driver here.

subject: Membership Renewal
body: Your membership expires in 3 days. Renew now to keep your current rate of $30/month.

subject: Code Review Needed
body: I've pushed the new feature branch (feat/login-auth). Can you review the PR before EOD? It's critical for the release.

subject: Black Friday Sale Starts Now!
body: 50% off everything in the store. Use code BLACKFRIDAY at checkout. Offer valid for 24 hours only.

subject: Lunch?
body: Heading to the taco place at 12:30. Want to join? I'm buying rounds.

subject: Invoice #1023 Failure
body: Your payment of $49.00 failed. Please update your card information to avoid service interruption.

subject: Business Proposal
body: I have $50M USD to transfer. I need your help. You will keep 10% for your assistance. Reply immediately.

subject: Ticket #502 Updated
body: Status changed from 'In Progress' to 'Done'. Assignee: You. Please verify the fix in staging.

subject: Rent Increase Notice
body: This is to inform you that your rent will increase by 5% starting next month due to market adjustments.

subject: The Future of LLMs
body: Are prompt engineers doomed? We discuss the rise of agentic AI and what it means for the industry.

subject: Google is hiring
body: I saw your profile and thought you'd be a great fit for a Senior Engineer role at Google. Are you open to a chat?

subject: Help with setup
body: Hi, I'm having trouble setting up the local environment. The documentation seems outdated. Can you help me for 10 mins?

subject: Town Hall Meeting
body: Reminder: The quarterly Town Hall starts in 1 hour. Attendance is mandatory for all department heads.

subject: Your lunch is on us (almost)
body: Get 30% off your next 3 orders. Use code YUMMY30. Expires tonight.

subject: Security Alert
body: New sign-in to your Google Account on a Windows device. Review activity now.

subject: Concert tickets?
body: Hey! I have two extra tickets to the Coldplay concert next month. Do you want them? Let me know ASAP.

subject: Payslip Available
body: Your payslip for November 2025 is now available to view on the portal.

subject: FINAL NOTICE: ACCOUNT SUSPENDED
body: We have suspended your Netflix account due to payment failure. Update payment info here or lose access forever.

subject: You have new mentions
body: You have 3 unread mentions in #general and #dev-ops. Click to view.

subject: Car trouble
body: My car won't start. Can you pick me up from the mechanic at 5 PM?

subject: AWS Budget Alert
body: Your account has exceeded 85% of your budgeted amount for this month.
